project_plan.name: Word Frequency Counter in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that reads a text file, counts the frequency of each word, and displays the top 10 most common words in the terminal.

task.name: Implement function to read the text file and preprocess the text
Implement function to count word frequencies
Implement function to retrieve the top 10 most common words
Write tests for the functions implemented above
Execute tests on all implemented functions to ensure they work correctly
